description.short: Designed to manage access to critical resources like restricted servers.
description.full: Ensure seamless deployments by managing access to critical resources from within MS Teams environment. Reserve and release access to resources like restricted servers while preventing conflict to enhance collaboration.

commands.title: Monitor
commands.description: Monitor the resource and notify when it is reserved or released.

commands.title: for
commands.description: Specify the duration of the action.

commands.title: after
commands.description: Specify the delay before the given action is performed.

commands.title: StopMonitoring
commands.description: Stop recieving notifications about the resource.
